name: Shaman Development Studio
description:
We are a software development studio based in Montevideo - Uruguay.
Creativity and vision are embedded in each solution we deliver. We have grown a specialized team in Human-Computer Interaction and in UX design, striving to make technology easier to use. An ever-evolving technological environment drives us to expand our knowledge, to improve our products and ourselves, keeping up to date with the latest and greatest.
In Shaman, analysts, designers and software engineers converge in a highly productive environment where not matter the kind project, problems or needs; we make the magic happen.
Thanks to our expansive technology stack and experience we are equipped to provide and deliver cutting edge solutions and consulting.
